summary.description: Items from FAQ (items_reference.json) not found in game binary (Europe version)
summary.note: Some items don't exist at all in Europe release

weapons.name: Dominion Dagger
weapons.note: Not found in Europe BIN (German 'Dominionfeder' is Dominion Feather, different item)

weapons.name: Pavas Axe
weapons.note: Only 'Pavas Armor' found in BIN, not the axe

armors.name: Holy Shield (ver2)
armors.note: User suggested 'Perseus Guard' but not found. Only 'Holy Shield' (def 4) and 'Perseus Bow' exist

robes.name: Guardian Robe (ver2)
robes.note: User suggested 'Ancient Robe' but not found in BIN

clothings.name: Knight's Bangle
clothings.note: No 'Bangle' or 'Bracelet' items found in BIN

found_equivalents.note: Added to all_items_clean.json as Feather Cloak

found_equivalents.english_description: A legendary shield forged by satan.
found_equivalents.note: Found as 'Lucifer's Shield' (with apostrophe). Added to all_items_clean.json

found_equivalents.english_description: An ancient amulet that heals the body.
found_equivalents.german_description: Sehr altes Amulett, das langsam Wunden heilt
